rows.comments: Alexander Property Management LLC is the 0.02% general partner of Alexander Investment Company.  The Senator owns 100% of Alexander Property Management LLC.
Chilhowee Mountain Music exists solely for the purpose of publishing agreements related to royalties for the musical composition “Falling Apart Together.”

rows.status-and-terms: State of Tennessee Pension - Defined benefit plan; will receive 1/2 of current governors salary following the termination of federal services; if deceased, spouse will receive 1/4 of payout.

Co-publishing agreement with Curb Records, Inc., d/b/a Mike Curb Music, and Lamar Alexander, d/b/a 
“Chilhowee Mountain Music” beginning January 1, 2010, regarding the musical composition “Falling Apart Together.”  Said agreement addresses copyright ownership and royalty income regarding “Falling Apart Together.”  Said agreement is renewable and binding until terminated.

Agreement with Broadcast Music, Inc. (“BMI”) and Lamar Alexander, d/b/a “Chilhowee Mountain Music” beginning May 14, 2010, regarding performance rights for musical compositions, including “Falling Apart Together.” Said agreement is renewable and binding until terminated.
